snippet.title: Reflec Beat Plus (iOS App Overview)
snippet.description:
Read The Description

- Please ignore my ghetto camera setup -

Reflec Beat Plus was released today by Konami in the Japanese App Store (iPad only currently)

In the video I go over the features such as the customization options that you can unlock as you play.  I also play a song to demo.  

Overall I am very impressed with the app, they took the success of Jubeat Plus and took it to the next level.  The unlock system and customization options are a really great new feature.  

The app is free in the Japanese App Store and comes with 3 songs.  There are already 4 song packs available for download on day 1.
